front.title: Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS) Operations, Administration, and Maintenance (OAM) Framework

abstract.t: This document describes the OAM framework and requirements for Computing-Aware Traffic Steering (CATS). The framework defines the CATS OAM layering model and OAM components. It also describes the requirements to enable the fault and the performance management of end-to-end connections from clients to networks and finally to services instances.
